segments.text: I went to play tennis in the public park .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How often do you play tennis ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Twice a week . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I seldom play tennis . I prefer football and basketball .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What is very difficult to gather team player together .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually play with my school-mates .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you like watching football matches ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I went to Tinge Sport Centre for football match last Sunday .
segments.speaker: S1
